TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IBuildEngine2 implements class Microsoft.Build.Framework.IBuildEngine

summary.span: 可讓工作作者使用 MSBuild 引擎的一小部分功能。

span.span: Provides a way for task authors to use a subset of the functionality of the MSBuild engine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 擴充，可讓您建置包含多個處理器或具有多個核心的處理器的系統上的多個專案檔，以平行方式。 extends , allowing you to build multiple project files in parallel on systems containing multiple processors, or processors with multiple cores.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool BuildProjectFile (string projectFileName, string[] targetNames, System.Collections.IDictionary globalProperties, System.Collections.IDictionary targetOutputs, string toolsVersion);

Initiates a build of a project file.

summary.span: 如果建置成功，則會傳回指定之目標的輸出 (如果有的話)。

span.span: If the build is successful, the outputs of the specified targets are returned, if any exist.

returns.span: 如果建置成功，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the build was successful; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未不指定任何目標，[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]建置專案的預設目標。If no targets are specified, [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] builds the default targets of the project. 目標輸出會當做傳回由目標名稱的陣列編製索引。Target outputs are returned as arrays indexed by target name.

summary.span: 允許工作在配備多個處理器的系統或多核心處理器上，啟始指定之專案檔的平行組建。

span.span: Allows tasks to initiate parallel builds of the specified project files on systems with multiple processors or multiple core processors.

summary.span: 如果建置成功，則會傳回指定之目標的輸出 (如果有的話)。

span.span: If the builds are successful, the outputs of the specified targets are returned, if any exist.

returns.span: 如果建置成功則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the build succeeded, if otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 同時`targetNames`和`targetOutputs`接受`null`值。Both `targetNames` and `targetOutputs` accept `null` values. 如果未不指定任何目標，則會建立預設的目標。If no targets are specified, then the default targets are built. 目標輸出會當做傳回由目標名稱的陣列編製索引。Target outputs are returned as arrays indexed by target name.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsRunningMultipleNodes As Boolean
public: property bool IsRunningMultipleNodes { bool get(); };

summary.span: 傳回系統是在單一處理器還是多處理器模式下執行。

span.span: Returns whether the system is running in single- or multi-processor mode.

value.span: 如果系統是在多處理器模式下執行，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the system is running in multi-processor mode, otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建置引擎會在單一處理器模式中 (`IsRunningMultipleNodes` = `false`) 當它進行初始化等於 1 的 Cpu 數目，並建置引擎不是子引擎。The build engine is in single-processor mode (`IsRunningMultipleNodes` = `false`) when it is initialized with the number of CPUs equal to 1 and the build engine is not a child engine. 建置引擎會在多處理器模式中 (`IsRunningMultipleNodes` = `true`) 會使用大於 1，Cpu 的數目在初始化時，或建置引擎時子引擎。The build engine is in multi-processor mode (`IsRunningMultipleNodes` = `true`) when it is initialized with a number of CPUs greater than 1, or when the build engine is a child engine.
